attachments.title: martanne/abduco
attachments.text: abduco provides session management i.e. it allows programs to be run independently from its controlling terminal. That is programs can be detached - run in the background - and then later reattache...

attachments.title: aaronjanse/3mux
attachments.text: Terminal multiplexer inspired by i3. Contribute to aaronjanse/3mux development by creating an account on GitHub.
